PyUnbound documentation
=======================================

This project contains an Unbound wrapper providing the thinnest layer over the library possible. 
Everything you can do from the libUnbound C API, you can do from Python, even more.

----------

	:maxdepth: 2

	install.rst
	examples/index.rst
	modules/unbound
